main event: A bright light with a long blue trail was sighted by pilots on board a tanker-transport aircraft in the Asian Far East region.
interesting points: The object was travelling at a high speed and appeared to be in level flight.
There was no detonation or explosion observed.
The object was lost to sight due to the distance and time lag.
The report was submitted by the pilots on board the tanker-transport aircraft.
Further action was not required due to insufficient data to determine the nature or identity of the sighting.
sighted object: a bright light with a long blue trail
witnesses: pilots on board a tanker-transport aircraft
